message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. This is a great price considering its value to you. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for your product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but $9,500 is still too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product and the fact that I have another buyer ready to pay $12,000. What do you say?
I understand your position, Alice. However, I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. I am willing to pay $10,000 for your product.
